text:
Kim and Kanye seen together for the first time since birth of Chicago(Picture: Splash News)

Proud parents Kim Kardashian and Kanye West have been spotted enjoying a low-key date days after welcoming baby Chicago.

On Friday Kanye was spotted alone and offering a rare smiling after the couple announced the birth of their new daughter via surrogate on 16 January.

But on Saturday Kim, who has two other children with Kanye, finally joined her hubby for the first time and it looks having a newborn in the house has not really affected their sleep, as neither look like they’ve lost a wink of sleep.

Kanye hosted a private screening for Honor Up – the Dame Dash-directed film he executive-produced in his Calabasas office – and of course, his wife used it as an opportunity to dress up.

Kim was not shy with this outfit (Picture: Splash Off)

Kim used the occasion to wear a very brave ensemble which consisted of a striking neon yellow sweater and distinctive snakeskin trousers topped off with matching boots.

Kanye, however, let his wife steal the limelight as he opted for a far more casual outfit.

(Picture: Splash News)

The couple announced their baby’s unique name on Friday and were later forced to reveal how to pronounce their baby daughter’s name.

Confirming that her nickname is Chi, Kim retweeted a message which read: ‘And to everyone who thinks it’s literally pronounced as CHI. No. It’s “Shy”.’

And Aunty Khloe also revealed how to pronounce the baby’s nickname, which, let’s face it, is probably what we’re going to go by.

She tweeted: ‘Hey Chi (shy).’

Whatever you think of the name we know young Chi will rock, just like her older siblings North, and Saint do.

Okay, so now we want a baby pic please and thanks.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a celebrity story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.
